Key Match Events: Breel Embolo scored the winning goal in added time
Kwadwo Duah scored the opening goal for Switzerland
Michel Aebischer scored the second goal for Switzerland
Post-Match Reflections: Murat Yakin praised Breel Embolo's comeback
Granit Xhaka highlighted Embolo's importance for the team
Miscellaneous Highlights: Switzerland won their first game of Euro 2024
Hungary's loss was their first in a competitive game since September 2022
Others: Switzerland's next game is against Scotland
Hungary will play Germany in their next game
